title: VVVVVV Source Code
summary:
VVVVVV Source Code

The source code for the popular 2010 indie game VVVVVV, created by Terry Cavanagh and featuring music by Magnus Pålsson, is now available on GitHub. The source code for the desktop version is included in the folder, and while the game is still commercially available at thelettervsixtim. es, it is completely free to compile for personal use. If you're interested in distributing a compiled version, more information can be found in the LICENSE. md file. Discussion about updates to the game primarily takes place on the "unofficial" VVVVVV Discord, in the vvvvvvv-code channel.
